sentences.sContent: Many women know how to make repairs on their cars.
sentences.sCn: 很多女性知道如何修理汽车。

sentences.sContent: Goldsmith has repaired the roof to ensure the house is windproof.
sentences.sCn: 戈德史密斯已经修理了房顶以确保房子可以抵御狂风。

synos.tran: [会计]修理；恢复（repair的三单形式）；弥补；纠正

phrases.pCn: 重复工具包；维修工具；工作服

trans.tranCn: 修理；[会计] 修理费；备件；修理工作（repair的复数形式）
trans.tranOther: A repair is something that you do to mend a machine, building, piece of clothing, or other thing that has been damaged or is not working properly

trans.tranCn: 修理；恢复（repair的三单形式）；弥补；纠正
trans.tranOther: If you repair something that has been damaged or is not working properly, you fix it
